area.key: OpenAI: Access OpenAI models via the OpenAI Api platform.
GitHub Models: A catalog and playground of AI models to help you build AI features and products.
Azure OpenAI: Control and configure AI models using the Azure AI Foundry platform.

Supported Azure OpenAI endpoints (protocol and hostname, for example: https://aoairesource.openai.azure.com.
Replace 'aoairesource' with your Azure OpenAI resource name).
https://{your-resource-name}.openai.azure.com
Ollama: use your own custom Ollama LLM models for translation
You must have this model installed on your ollama instance
the full url to your ollama server (e.g. https://localhost:11434)
Choose which API Library to use when sending translations
Translation via AI can be complex and require changes to configuration to work for you. please test before sending lots of text. You may incur API costs while using this connector.
In order to use the an AI Translation API, you will need to supply an API Key - this key is then used to translate using your OpenAi account.
AI Model to use to translation
Number of milliseconds to wait between calls (To Avoid API Throttling)
Split any HTML before sending to translation
Make sure html elments are marked as html when sent to translation

The AI connector allows you to use OpenAi for text translation

AI Prompt

For 'base' or legacy' models the connector will send the following prompt to the api:

%0%

The exact number of tokens, and usage will be determained by the AI settings you are using to perform the translation.
Control the fine detail of the Ai request

Tweak the options being sent to the AI request.

These values are the internal AI Compleation Options. see the OpenAi documentation for more information.
The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion.
Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far
Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far
Control the promt sent to Open AI for translation
Choose which API Library to use when sending translations
Optional conversation id to keep context between calls
